title: Offering Table
description:
Offering table. Sandstone. Rectangular. Decoration in low relief shows typical broad offering stand with grilled sides, flanked by two large libation vases (Kbh), with outflowing water geometrically stylized, and topped by a deep water-tank; double border, from top of which spout issues through plain field to edge of stone. Simple but rather good work. Block well dressed; lower half bevelled to underside.
Condition: Weathered.

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
